snippet.title: Stardust Odyssey - Announcement Trailer | PS VR
snippet.description:
Stardust Odyssey is a PlayStation VR adventure game blending sci-fi and fantasy with an exotic
oriental mood, developed by the French game developers Agharta Studio. Find out more at
http://stardustodyssey.com
https://www.aghartastudio.com
The evil of the Abyss has returned, and it is up to you to stop the threat!
Jump aboard your Ethercraft and explore mysterious convoys of nomads! Find the 9 Relics and
use your magic against the Guardians to restore the balance of your world.
Navigate through merchant ships filled with treasures, search for the hidden Ethers, upgrade
your ship, and defeat colossal Guardians in epic boss battles! But beware of the creatures of the
Abyss hidden in the dark…
